ModMetaData.name: TV is Educational
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img]
TV can be educational for children, depending on the show of course. When playing I got a child with paralytic abasia that was constantly upset over not being able to get education during the recovery period. So I made this mod to remedy the situation.
This mod, based heavily on my continuation of Peladors mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2194535018]TVForPrison[/url], gives a low amount of education to children via a powered TV or radio. Tech-level, amount of joy given by the equipment and the mood of the child affects the amount of education given. A normal tv for a child with a decent mood should suffice to keep the educational need from falling.
Supports tv/radios from the following mods: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1718190143]Vanilla Furniture Expanded[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2028381079]Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1994340640]WallStuff[/url] [/list]
